info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 10:39PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Custer and northern Fall River Counties through 1145 PM MDT... At 1039 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Dewey, or 16 miles north of Edgemont, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Argyle around 1055 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Pringle, Custer, Mount Coolidge, Blue Bell, Legion Lake, Stockade Lake, Buffalo Corrals, Center Lake, State Game Lodge and Black Hills Playhouse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
